title: Arabic 28
text: Know thou of a truth: He that biddeth men be just and himself committeth iniquity is not of Me, even though he bear My name.

prev.title: Arabic 27
prev.text: Breathe not the sins of others so long as thou art thyself a sinner. Shouldst thou transgress this command, accursed wouldst thou be, and to this I bear witness.
prev.teaser: Breathe not the sins of others...

next.title: Arabic 29
next.text: Ascribe not to any soul that which thou wouldst not have ascribed to thee, and say not that which thou doest not. This is My command unto thee, do thou observe it.
